channel.title: Laptop Question
channel.description: hey, i am sending my laptop for service to Acer Service center (beacuse my computer thinks someone is holding onto the left mouse button or touch pad)...Eariler try to slove this problem ( i didn't know what was going on with the mouse)..i formated my laptop, with windows vista ultimate black edition 2009 (windows ultimate, tweaked for better performance...and yea i torrented it)...now originally my laptop came with a windows vista basic..now if i send my laptop with the torrented modified version of windows vista..would i be in trouble...i guess i would be if they checked...but would they care at all

item.title: Laptop Question
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

sanga282:

they might think its the software that caused the issue and then they wont repair it for you

Returns people can be dicks. I always take an image of the original software installed in case I ever have to return.

Read full topic
